name: Corgi Cove
description:
Take control of Gizmo, a super smart Corgi forced to solve Synchronous Puzzles.



After becoming stranded on a tropical island with an abandoned secret research facility, Gizmo must complete complex tasks, with the help of his corgi clones, in order to be reunited with his missing owner.



Complete more than 50 mentally challenging levels across 9 sectors in Corgi Cove!
